evidence.text: Person A: My husband's in danger, Martha.
Person A: My husband's in danger, Martha.

Person A: ...I still can't describe the excruciating hours I spent in prison, but I can guarantee you that I was there with your husband. Although I couldn't see him, I heard him say: Rubens Beyrodt Paiva. Before I was transferred, I heard his voice one last time, asking for water. I pray that the family will be reunited soon. Give my best to my old students Vera, Eliana, and Ana.
